mapper.select: SELECT open_id, `name` AS commodityName, `price` AS commodityPrice, `introduce`, `thumbnail`, picture_json, limit_buy, created_name, created_time FROM sesame_commodity WHERE del_flag = 1 AND open_id = #{openId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sesame_commodity WHERE del_flag = 1 AND sesame_shop_id = #{shopId}
SELECT `id`, sesame_shop_id, sesame_category_id, `enable` FROM sesame_commodity WHERE del_flag AND open_id = #{commodityOpenId}
SELECT sesame_shop_id FROM sesame_commodity WHERE del_flag = 1 AND open_id = #{commodityOpenId}

SELECT sc.open_id AS commodityOpenId, sc.thumbnail, sc.`name` AS commodityName, sc.`price` FROM sesame_commodity sc
LEFT JOIN sesame_commodity_category_sort cs ON sc.`id` = cs.sesame_commodity_id
WHERE sc.del_flag = 1 AND sc.sesame_shop_id = #{shopId}
AND cs.sesame_category_id = #{categoryId}
ORDER BY
cs.`sort`
sc.created_time DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sesame_commodity sco LEFT JOIN sesame_clerk scl ON sco.sesame_shop_id = scl.sesame_shop_id WHERE sco.del_flag = 1 AND scl.del_flag = 1 AND sco.open_id = #{commodityOpenId} AND scl.sesame_user_id = #{userId}
